title: typographically sound beachy font ideas
content: I am working on a letterhead suite for a friend of mine and the entire suite is beach/watercolor themed and I'm struggling to find a type that gives the soft, laidback feeling without being a bad display font. Any suggestions?
author: alderce0

comments.content:
For example, this is one piece that I've been working with. Lots of watercolor washes like that background.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817034911im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kayla_watercolor_letterhead_may1-21_5571.png)
I don't know why that uploaded so large. Sorry.
